case.state: Excuse me, but has anyone seen my teammate, Ruby Rose? She dragged me here to play cards, but now I can't find her anywhere...
Fortunately, I am rather skilled at card games... But still, I can't help but worry. You would not believe the sort of trouble that Ruby can get up to unsupervised.
